etomica.normalmode

Class SimOverlapSoftSphereHCP

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.simulation.Simulation
      • etomica.normalmode.SimOverlapSoftSphereHCP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimulation

    public class SimOverlapSoftSphereHCP
extends Simulation
    Simulation to run sampling with the soft-sphere potential, but measuring the harmonic potential based on normal mode data from a previous simulation. The original Bennett's Overlapping Sampling Simulation - used to check for the computation time
